variants.name: NoEffect
variants.description: Timer event has no effect

variants.name: SetActive
variants.description: Timer event forces the output to its active state

variants.name: Independent
variants.description: Update done independently from the DMA burst transfer completion

variants.name: Completion
variants.description: Update done when the DMA burst transfer is completed

variants.name: Rollover
variants.description: Update done on master timer roll-over following a DMA burst transfer completion

variants.name: NoEffect
variants.description: Timer event has no effect

variants.name: TriggerCapture
variants.description: Timer event triggers capture

variants.name: Output1Active
variants.description: Signal applied on output 1 and output 2 forced inactive

variants.name: Output2Active
variants.description: Signal applied on output 2 and output 1 forced inactive

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: No DAC trigger generated

variants.name: DACSync1
variants.description: Trigger generated on DACSync1

variants.name: DACSync2
variants.description: Trigger generated on DACSync2

variants.name: DACSync3
variants.description: Trigger generated on DACSync3

variants.name: Standard
variants.description: CMP register is always active (standard compare mode)

variants.name: Capture1
variants.description: CMP is recomputed and is active following a capture 1 event

variants.name: CaptureX_Compare1
variants.description: CMP is recomputed and is active following a capture 1 event or a Compare 1 match

variants.name: CaptureX_Compare3
variants.description: CMP is recomputed and is active following a capture 1 event or a Compare 3 match

variants.name: Output1_EE6
variants.description: Output 1 delayed idle on external event 6

variants.name: Output2_EE6
variants.description: Output 2 delayed idle on external event 6

variants.name: Output1_2_EE6
variants.description: Output 1 and 2 delayed idle on external event 6

variants.name: Balanced_EE6
variants.description: Balanced idle on external event 6

variants.name: Output1_EE7
variants.description: Output 1 delayed idle on external event 7

variants.name: Output2_EE7
variants.description: Output 2 delayed idle on external event 7

variants.name: Output1_2_EE7
variants.description: Output 1 and 2 delayed idle on external event 7

variants.name: Balanced_EE7
variants.description: Balanced idle on external event 7

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: No filtering

variants.name: BlankResetToCompare1
variants.description: Blanking from counter reset/roll-over to Compare 1

variants.name: BlankResetToCompare2
variants.description: Blanking from counter reset/roll-over to Compare 2

variants.name: BlankResetToCompare3
variants.description: Blanking from counter reset/roll-over to Compare 3

variants.name: BlankResetToCompare4
variants.description: Blanking from counter reset/roll-over to Compare 4

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR1
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR1 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR2
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR2 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR3
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR3 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR4
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR4 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR5
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR5 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR6
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR6 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR7
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR7 source

variants.name: BlankTIMFLTR8
variants.description: Blanking from another timing unit: TIMFLTR8 source

variants.name: WindowResetToCompare2
variants.description: Windowing from counter reset/roll-over to compare 2

variants.name: WindowResetToCompare3
variants.description: Windowing from counter reset/roll-over to compare 3

variants.name: WindowTIMWIN
variants.description: Windowing from another timing unit: TIMWIN source

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: No action: the output is not affected by the fault input and stays in run mode

variants.name: SetActive
variants.description: Output goes to active state after a fault event

variants.name: SetInactive
variants.description: Output goes to inactive state after a fault event

variants.name: SetHighZ
variants.description: Output goes to high-z state after a fault event

variants.name: Ignored
variants.description: Fault input ignored

variants.name: Active
variants.description: Fault input is active and can disable HRTIM outputs

variants.name: NoEffect
variants.description: Timer event has no effect

variants.name: SetInactive
variants.description: Timer event forces the output to its inactive state

variants.name: Output1Active
variants.description: Protection occurred when the output 1 was active and output 2 forced inactive

variants.name: Output2Active
variants.description: Protection occurred when the output 2 was active and output 1 forced inactive

variants.name: Inactive
variants.description: Output is or was inactive

variants.name: Active
variants.description: Output is or was active

variants.name: ActiveHigh
variants.description: Positive polarity (output active high)

variants.name: ActiveLow
variants.description: Negative polarity (output active low)

variants.name: NoEffect
variants.description: Timer Y compare Z event has no effect

variants.name: ResetCounter
variants.description: Timer X counter is reset upon timer Y compare Z event

variants.name: Positive
variants.description: Positive deadtime on falling edge

variants.name: Negative
variants.description: Negative deadtime on falling edge

variants.name: Positive
variants.description: Positive deadtime on rising edge

variants.name: Negative
variants.description: Negative deadtime on rising edge

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: Disabled. HRTIM is not synchronized and runs in standalone mode

variants.name: Internal
variants.description: Internal event: the HRTIM is synchronized with the on-chip timer

variants.name: External
variants.description: External event: a positive pulse on HRTIM_SCIN input triggers the HRTIM

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: Disabled

variants.name: PositivePulse
variants.description: Positive pulse on SCOUT output (16x f_HRTIM clock cycles)

variants.name: NegativePulse
variants.description: Negative pulse on SCOUT output (16x f_HRTIM clock cycles)

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: Synchronization event has no effect on Timer x

variants.name: Reset
variants.description: Synchronization event resets Timer x

variants.name: MasterStart
variants.description: Master timer Start

variants.name: MasterCompare1
variants.description: Master timer Compare 1 event

variants.name: TimerAStart
variants.description: Timer A start/reset

variants.name: TimerACompare1
variants.description: Timer A Compare 1 event

variants.name: Disabled
variants.description: Synchronization event has no effect on Timer x

variants.name: Start
variants.description: Synchronization event starts Timer x

variants.name: Inactive
variants.description: Not in delayed idle or balanced idle mode

variants.name: Active
variants.description: Delayed idle or balanced idle mode entry

variants.name: Independent
variants.description: Update occurs independently from the DMA burst transfer

variants.name: DMABurst
variants.description: Update occurs when the DMA burst transfer is completed

variants.name: DMABurst_Update
variants.description: Update occurs on the update event following DMA burst transfer completion

variants.name: Input1
variants.description: Update occurs on a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 1

variants.name: Input2
variants.description: Update occurs on a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 2

variants.name: Input3
variants.description: Update occurs on a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 3

variants.name: Input1_Update
variants.description: Update occurs on the update event following a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 1

variants.name: Input2_Update
variants.description: Update occurs on the update event following a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 2

variants.name: Input3_Update
variants.description: Update occurs on the update event following a rising edge of HRTIM update enable input 3
